examples.example: 我一直期待着能有一场说走就走的旅游，去看看外面的精彩世界。

translate.english: I have always been looking forward to having a trip that I can leave at any time to see the wonderful world outside.

examples.example: 假期时我和家人一起去旅游，度过了一段非常美好的时光。

translate.english: During the vacation, I went traveling with my family and had a really wonderful time.

examples.example: 我计划在假期去旅游，领略祖国的大好河山。

translate.english: I plan to travel during the holiday and appreciate the great rivers and mountains of the motherland.
